title: Any idea on this script font?
content:
Does anyone know which script font is it?  
I have searched for long and still can't find the answer.

Thanks in advance!

Font: 

 Bickham Script Bold using alts 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102537/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102537/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_3.png) | 44.48 KB |
author: micsheep

comments.content: Looks like [Champion Script PF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102537/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-champion-script-pro) Bold using some swash alternates

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102537im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BickhamScriptUsingAlts1_5049.jpg)
  
Bickham Script Bold using alts:  
 [http://www.identifont.com/find?similar=bickham+Script&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102537/http:/www.identifont.com/find?similar=bickham+Script&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?similar=bickham+Script&q=Go")  
Don
Of course Don is right! Sorry for the mistake.
